channel.title: [Pi] questions and server help
channel.description: I cannot figure out how to change the name of the bank interface when u open your bank, and how to change the logout when it says after you click the X you are logging out of runescape or whatever.. how do u change that to say your server name?

item.title: [Pi] questions and server help
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:4, topic:378636”]go to texthandler.java and clicking most.java and search for (welcome to) and (thank you for playing)

*edit im not sure those are client sided, but they might be both, (its been to long since PI sorry)[/quote]Dude… that is not in PI its in Delta xD and why would you answer this if you haven’t done PI in so long x_x

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] questions and server help
item.dc:creator: @mikirune mikirune
item.description:
@mikirune wrote:

My first question, i meant the name of the bank, like The bank of Runescape, where it says tht at the top of the bank screen, can I change that?

my second question I mean once you hit the logout X, it brings you to a tab and has some words saying you are about to leave runescape or something and I wanna change it to my server name.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] questions and server help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

bank interface cant be changed i think , as for your second question , please be more specific…
do you mean those grey tablets on which there usually stands ’ Welcome to RuneScape’?

Read full topic
